data.name: AddMoneyTooltip
data.value: Make sure Money Anarchy feature is enabled

data.name: AllowsDynamicToggling
data.value: This option allows dynamic toggle within game

data.name: BuiltinModWarning
data.value: Game Anarchy already includes all the features of this mods, to ensure the normal operation of Game Anarchy, the following mods have been forcibly disabled.

data.name: CityServiceOptions
data.value: Options des services de la ville

data.name: CustomUnlockMinor
data.value: These options are not available when “Unlock All” feature is enabled because Unlock All has unlocked all of the following options. Although the following options will take effect when the game refreshes the milestone, it is recommended to set them before entering the game.

data.name: EnableAchievements
data.value: Le système de succès est toujours disponible

data.name: EnabledUnlimitedUniqueBuildings
data.value: Permet de placer des bâtiments uniques sans limite

data.name: MaximizeAttractiveness
data.value: Maximiser l'attractivité, permettra d'attraper plus de touristes

data.name: MaximizeEducationCoverage
data.value: Optimiser la couverture de l'éducation, tout en ayant besoin d'écoles pour obtenir des citoyens éduqués

data.name: MaximizeEntertainment
data.value: Maximiser le divertissement, améliorera le bonheur des citoyens

data.name: MaximizeLandValue
data.value: Maximiser la valeur du terrain de la ville

data.name: MilestonelevelName_MilestoneUnlockLevel
data.value: Niveau de déverrouillage d'une étape importante

data.name: MOD_Description
data.value: Étend et optimise les fonctions du jeu.

data.name: MoneyAnarchyModeMinor
data.value: This option allows automatic (set the following 2 options)/manual (use hotkey) set money, allows dynamic toggle within game

data.name: OptionPanelCategoriesHorizontalOffsetMinor
data.value: This option takes effect after adjustment

data.name: OptionPanelCategoriesUpdated
data.value: Show mod updated date in options panel categories

data.name: OptionPanelCategoriesUpdatedMinor
data.value: This option only takes effect after refreshing the plugins list or restarting the game

data.name: OptionsPanelHorizontalOffset
data.value: Décalage horizontal des catégories du panneau d'options

data.name: OtherFunctionsMinor
data.value: Use the shortcut keys or the UUI button to invoke the Control Panel, if you want to adjust the options in the Control Panel, close the Options Panel first.

data.name: PutOutBurningBuildingsDescription
data.value: This is not a permanent fire removal feature and will only be called once to remove all buildings that are on fire. Are you sure you want to put out burning buildings?

data.name: RemoveAirportBuildingFire
data.value: Enlever l'incendie du bâtiment de l'aéroport

data.name: RemoveCrime
data.value: Retirer les criminels de tous les bâtiments et maximiser la couverture des services de police

data.name: RemoveDeath
data.value: Enlevez les citoyens morts et maximisez la couverture des soins de décès

data.name: RemoveIndustrialBuildingFire
data.value: Enlever le feu du bâtiment industriel

data.name: RemoveNotEnoughMoneyMinor
data.value: When “Money Anarchy” or "Unlimited Money" is enabled, this option is enabled automatically enforced.

data.name: RemovePlayerBuildingFire
data.value: Enlever le feu du bâtiment du joueur

data.name: SetBefore
data.value: It is recommended to set this before entering the game/save

data.name: SortSettings
data.value: Trier les noms des mods dans le panneau des options

data.name: StartMoneyMinor
data.value: Set value before you start gaming. If you don't want money to be this value every time you load save, disable this feature after enabling it once, if you load save, the money will change after the game simulation starts.

data.name: TreeSpreadFireProbability
data.value: Probabilité de propagation du feu de l'arbre

data.name: UnlimitedMoneyConflict
data.value: Game Anarchy also extended money anarchy function, allowing manual add money, automatic add money, check Game Anarchy option panel.

data.name: UnlimitedOilAndOreConflict
data.value: Game Anarchy also can adjuster consumption rate, check Game Anarchy control panel in game.

data.name: UnlockAllConflict
data.value: Game Anarchy also extend the custom unlock, check Game Anarchy option panel.

data.name: UnlockAllMinor
data.value: Cette fonctionnalité "Tous déverrouiller" est identique à la version vanilla, et bien qu'elle permette un basculement dynamique dans le jeu, il est recommandé de la définir avant d'entrer dans la sauvegarde. Si elle est désactivée, cette option déverrouille toujours tout, assurez-vous d'avoir désactivé "Find It / Trouvez le" ! Dans les options "Tous déverrouiller".

data.name: UnlockMetroTrack
data.value: Déverrouiller toutes les voies de métro

data.name: UnlockUniqueBuildingMinor
data.value: Déverrouillez tous les bâtiments uniques aux niveaux 1 à 6. En raison des restrictions du jeu, si cette option est forcée pour être déverrouillée, un petit nombre de bâtiments seront déverrouillés, mais pas tous.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7ADD1
data.value: [ADD] Nouveau panneau de contrôle, utilisez le raccourci clavier par défaut Ctrl + Maj + G ou utilisez le panneau UUI pour faire apparaitre le nouveau panneau de contrôle.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7ADD2
data.value: [ADD] Placez des bâtiments uniques sans limite de fonctionnalités maintenant divisées et intégrées dans le panneau de contrôle.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7ADD3
data.value: [ADD] Ajout de la fonction de contrôle de la propagation du feu.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7ADD4
data.value: [ADD] La fonction pour enlever le feu maintenant divisée en plusieurs options, peut contrôler le feu de différents types de bâtiments.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7FIX
data.value: [FIX] Correction de l'emplacement anormal des composants de l'interface utilisateur.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7UPT1
data.value: [UPT] Mise à jour du framework et une amélioration des performances.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_7UPT2
data.value: [UPT] Mise à jour des composants de l'interface d'options utilisateur.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_8ADD
data.value: [ADD]Added advanced option for reset mod config.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_8FIX1
data.value: [FIX]Fixed an issue where control panel did not follow the language toggle.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_8FIX2
data.value: [FIX]Fixed an issue where the money option in options panel could not be changed.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_8OPT2
data.value: [OPT]Optimized control panel toggle button UI style.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9ADD0
data.value: Added show mods updated date for the category bar of the options panel function.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9ADD1
data.value: Added building, segment refund function, including remove time limitation, multiplier factor adjustment, included in the control panel.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9ADD2
data.value: Option panel added a entry button option to invoke the control panel.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9ADD3
data.value: Added the ability to adjust the cost of relocate building, included in the control panel.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9ADD4
data.value: Added Remove not enough money warning function.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9FIX0
data.value: Fixed an issue where still catch fire after remove fires.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9OPT0
data.value: Optimized the options panel categories horizontal offset option, which now takes effect after adjustment.

data.name: UpdateLog_V0_9_9OPT1
data.value: Optimized the start money setting logic so that the start money is the value you set when you start a new game.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_0_0ADD0
data.value: Added unlimited placement of festival area buildings.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_0_0FIX0
data.value: Fixed control panel settings sometimes not automatically save.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_0_1FIX0
data.value: Fixed an issue where normal buildings could only be placed once.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_0_1FIX1
data.value: Fixed an issue where the mod would not work at all when loading the config file incorrectly.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1ADD1
data.value: Added put out burning buildings feature.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1ADD2
data.value: Added unlimited place treasure hunt buildings feature.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1ADD3
data.value: Integrated [You Can Build It] mod functions.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1FIX0
data.value: Fixed an issue where unlock public transport was not fully unlocked.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1FIX1
data.value: Fixed an issue where unlimited oil, unlimited ore is not working properly.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1OPT0
data.value: Optimize unlock info view performance issues.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1UPT2
data.value: UUI button and separate tool button are now optional.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1_1FIX0
data.value: Fixed an issue where the remove not enough money limitation function could not take effect.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1_1FIX1
data.value: Fixed some issues with the control panel.

data.name: UpdateLog_V1_1_UPT1
data.value: Updated compatibility check. When three built-in unlimited mods are detected to be enabled, they are automatically disabled to ensure mod compatibility.

data.name: VanillaUnlimitedMoneyModeMinor
data.value: Money in game only displays “∞”, this option allows dynamic toggle within game
